BillingRoleAssignment.description: The properties of the billing role assignment.

BillingRoleAssignmentListResult.description: A container for a list of resources

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

BillingRoleAssignmentProperties.description: The properties of the billing role assignment.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the resource during a long-running operation.

createdOn.description: The date the role assignment was created.

createdByPrincipalTenantId.description: The tenant Id of the user who created the role assignment.

createdByPrincipalId.description: The object ID of the user who created the role assignment.

createdByPrincipalPuid.description: The principal PUID of the user who created the role assignment.

createdByUserEmailAddress.description: The email address of the user who created the role assignment. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

modifiedOn.description: The date the role assignment was modified.

modifiedByPrincipalPuid.description: The principal PUID of the user who modified the role assignment.

modifiedByUserEmailAddress.description: The email address of the user who modified the role assignment. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

modifiedByPrincipalId.description: The principal PUID of the user who modified the role assignment.

modifiedByPrincipalTenantId.description: The tenant Id of the user who modified the role assignment.

principalPuid.description: The principal PUID of the user to whom the role was assigned.

principalId.description: The object id of the user to whom the role was assigned.

principalTenantId.description: The principal tenant id of the user to whom the role was assigned.

roleDefinitionId.description: The ID of the role definition.

scope.description: The scope at which the role was assigned.

userAuthenticationType.description: The authentication type of the user, whether Organization or MSA, of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

userEmailAddress.description: The email address of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

principalTenantName.description: The friendly name of the tenant of the user to whom the role was assigned. This will be 'Primary Tenant' for the primary tenant of the billing account.

principalDisplayName.description: The display name of the principal to whom the role was assigned.

principalType.description: The type of a role Assignment.

billingRequestId.description: The ID of the billing request that was created for the role assignment. This is only applicable to cross tenant role assignments or role assignments created through the billing request.

billingAccountId.description: The fully qualified ID that uniquely identifies a billing account.

billingAccountDisplayName.description: The name of the billing account.

billingProfileId.description: The fully qualified ID that uniquely identifies a billing profile.

billingProfileDisplayName.description: The name of the billing profile.

invoiceSectionId.description: The fully qualified ID that uniquely identifies an invoice section.

invoiceSectionDisplayName.description: The name of the invoice section.

customerId.description: The fully qualified ID that uniquely identifies a customer.
